__e: No, Jim, it's not your fault it happened.
Not me! No, Jim is nothing like my dad.
I mean, Jim was never like that, not at all.
I mean, nothing would've happened with me and Jim if he didn't put himself out there.
I mean, Jim was never like that, not at all.
Not me! No, Jim is nothing like my dad.
Just let Jim know that it wasn't them. I wasn't sure.
Jim--Jim, what are you-- what are you-- What are you doing here?
Just tell Jim that I said hi.
Jim is an old friend, okay?
It's just been so chaotic with Jim gone that I--
Jim is a great guy, he's like a brother to me.
- I can't. Jim, this was a one-off, okay?
And if that reason has anything to do with why Jim was killed... We talking alone here?
You see, that's your idea of normal Jim, so everyone else!

...just the fact that Jim gave me the case.
